transcript_chunks.text: that's the biggest travesty that nobody's talking about now andy cortez is that the avengers assemble was number three are you kidding me i agree the most disgusting event of the night the most egregious herd when there's when the hardcore zack snyder fans showed the up but what the hell could number one be and it's the flash running into the speed force from the snyder cut of justice league and i'm like wow the people who are supporters of snyder say what you will about them they're organized
